=== Firmware Test Suite - uefirttime test ===
The uefirttime test checks the UEFI runtime service !GetTime, !SetTime, !GetWakeupTime and !GetWakeupTime interfaces. The test will:
* test for set time of the UEFI runtime service
* test for get time of the UEFI runtime service 
* test for set wakeup time of the UEFI runtime service
* test for get wakeup time of the UEFI runtime service

==== Examples: ====

<code>sudo fwts uefirttime -</code>

..runs uefirttime on your machine and dumps the output to stdout.
